Are you ready to draw the perfect picture?
If yes, then pick an image and open it with the app.
Rotate, shrink or zoom to find the best alignment.
Lock the screen, put a paper over the display and start tracing.
tracing_paper_help: Copy an image from the screen to a physical paper. Find an image as a template. Rotate, shrink or zoom to find the perfect alignment. Lock the screen, put a paper over the display and start tracing.
